name: plant humanoid v0.1
description:
credits to: junko dev | also game is in development (no zombies yet D:)

the character is a 6 months old plant humanoid who was just learning how to move and use guns to save humanity from being extinct because of zombies dadadadawiodwdnawdoadnawdnwadnawifeFaaaaaaaaaa

gun information -

  machine gun - rapidly shoots bullets

rocket launcher - explosion occurs on hit

stupid sniper - can be shot at any direction

the next updates will contain zombiess and more guns, perhaps there will be boss battles at the end of the level, btw you can hold E to shoot on some guns and sniper requires the red thingy to be green (the red thing must be ontop of your mouse cursor for it to be gree
